## Post metadata ideas

See source code for implementation details. Seems to be mostly just reading yaml metadata fields and linking them to

-   [gwern.net](https://www.gwern.net/Sidenotes.page) - `created:` & `modified:` for date post was started & last edited
-   `status:` seedling/budding/evergreen (conceptual)/deciduous (likely to break)
-   assumed audience (maggie appleton colophon)
-   reading time
